## ğŸ› ï¸ ê¸°ìˆ  ìŠ¤íƒ

### Backend
- **Framework**: Spring Boot 3.5.3
- **Language**: Java 17
- **Database**: MySQL 8.0
- **Cache**: Redis
- **Build Tool**: Gradle
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions

### AI & External
- **AI Service**: Perplexity AI API
- **Push Notification**: Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM)
- **Email**: Spring Mail

### Infrastructure
- **Cloud**: AWS (EC2, RDS)
- **Container**: Docker
- **Monitoring**: Spring Actuator
